![KakaoTalk_Photo_2023-12-28-18-20-10](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/155061453/56780e49-5576-4ea3-a8f6-766273e49a92)


### about issue
- following websites are broken after 15~20 seconds.
    - dogdrip.net
    - loawa.com
    - mlbpark.donga.com
    - m.ygosu.com
    - m.inven.co.kr
- it only happens in iOS and macOS Safari browser.

### Problem
- This issue is resolve when i disable this filter: https://filters.adtidy.org/ios/filters/2_optimized.txt
- These lines makes website breakage
   - `||html-load.com^$popup`
   - `||07c225f3.online^$popup`
   - `||content-loader.com^$popup`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

![KakaoTalk_Photo_2023-12-28-18-20-10](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/155061453/56780e49-5576-4ea3-a8f6-766273e49a92)


### about issue
- following websites are broken after 15~20 seconds.
    - dogdrip.net
    - loawa.com
    - mlbpark.donga.com
    - m.ygosu.com
    - m.inven.co.kr
- it only happens in iOS and macOS Safari browser.

### Problem
- This issue is resolve when i disable this filter: https://filters.adtidy.org/ios/filters/2_optimized.txt
- These lines makes website breakage
   - `||html-load.com^$popup`
   - `||07c225f3.online^$popup`
   - `||content-loader.com^$popup`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Не повторяется. 
Попробуйте очистить данные браузера, обновить фильтры (подождите около одной минуты), затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

pull_request.title: Temedya generic
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Closes #170373

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment



2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
Not reproduced - the site opens fine on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tv.vg.no/ (probably geo restricted)

https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.vg.no/`

### Issue:
Some videos won't load, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted first.

### Examples:
`https://tv.vg.no/` (probably geo restricted)

`https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/`

### Screenshots:
* **With blocked cookie consent:**

![filterissue-vg3](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/6789847f-3b9f-406e-8229-fe4f33e35a7a)

* **After the cookie consent has been accepted:**

![filterissue-vg4](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/cde055a1-3424-4015-94dc-a24059337ba8)

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
```
speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Possible fix:
```
- speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]

+ speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/18245/~~ _**(FIXED)**_
~~`||cmp.vg.no^`~~

* **I don't care about cookies** **_(NOTIFIED)_**
```
/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=vg.no|boerse.de|bt.no|liberation.fr

cmp.$domain=telerama.fr|courrierinternational.com|vodkaster.com|svd.se|histoire-et-civilisations.com|malservice.aftonbladet.se|vg.no|tv.nu|tek.no|finn.no|pent.no|godt.no|aftenposten.no|omni.se|e24.no|helthjem.no|minmote.no|aftenbladet.no|klart.se
```

### Temp fix:
~~`vg.no#@#div[id^="sp_message_container_"]`
`@@||cmp.vg.no^`
`||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important`~~

### Updated temp. fix (for uBO):
Until everything has been resolved, this should cover the current issues for all of the mentioned problem filters, in a more convenient way:
```
vg.no##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .btns-container > button[title="Tilpass"])
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .message-row > button[title="Avvis alle"], , 2000)
@@||cmp.vg.no^
||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important
@@||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^$domain=vg.no
```
(Credit for the above `##+js` rules goes to **piquark6046**)

--

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

adguard v4.4 nightly 3

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome, Microsoft Edge

Mobile

https://exego.app/q474L6s2Wjs

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

Peter Lowe's Blocklist

AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Annoyances

_No response_

_No response_

AdGuard DNS filter

List-KR, YousList

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Block WebRTC, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI

issue.title: VG.no - Blocked videos (AdGuard Cookie Notices filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tv.vg.no/ (probably geo restricted)

https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.vg.no/`

### Issue:
Some videos won't load, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted first.

### Examples:
`https://tv.vg.no/` (probably geo restricted)

`https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/`

### Screenshots:
* **With blocked cookie consent:**

![filterissue-vg3](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/6789847f-3b9f-406e-8229-fe4f33e35a7a)

* **After the cookie consent has been accepted:**

![filterissue-vg4](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/cde055a1-3424-4015-94dc-a24059337ba8)

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
```
speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Possible fix:
```
- speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]

+ speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/18245/~~ _**(FIXED)**_
~~`||cmp.vg.no^`~~

* **I don't care about cookies** **_(NOTIFIED)_**
```
/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=vg.no|boerse.de|bt.no|liberation.fr

cmp.$domain=telerama.fr|courrierinternational.com|vodkaster.com|svd.se|histoire-et-civilisations.com|malservice.aftonbladet.se|vg.no|tv.nu|tek.no|finn.no|pent.no|godt.no|aftenposten.no|omni.se|e24.no|helthjem.no|minmote.no|aftenbladet.no|klart.se
```

### Temp fix:
~~`vg.no#@#div[id^="sp_message_container_"]`
`@@||cmp.vg.no^`
`||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important`~~

### Updated temp. fix (for uBO):
Until everything has been resolved, this should cover the current issues for all of the mentioned problem filters, in a more convenient way:
```
vg.no##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .btns-container > button[title="Tilpass"])
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .message-row > button[title="Avvis alle"], , 2000)
@@||cmp.vg.no^
||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important
@@||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^$domain=vg.no
```
(Credit for the above `##+js` rules goes to **piquark6046**)

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v121.0-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> piquark6046 closed this as completed

@piquark6046:
This isn't fixed yet!
See my post here:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/170285#issuecomment-1884952884

issue.title: Русский фильтр AdGuard (1_optimized.txt) ломает фильтрацию яндекс - рекламы.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11 [54]

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

zoneofgames.ru

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Очередной косяк с вашими фильтрами. Русский фильтр AdGuard (1_optimized.txt) ломает фильтрацию яндекс - рекламы. Конкретно, реклама начинает лезть из-за фильтра
>||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js$script,xmlhttprequest,redirect-rule=noopjs

Ещё в подписках есть подобные фильтры (их там хватает в разных подписках)

>@@||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js$domain=russia-tv.online
>@@||yandex.ru/ads/system/context.js|$script,domain=playground.ru

которые попросту пропускают рекламу. Попытка полностью заблокировать непотрество яндекса фильтром "||yandex.ru/ads^" для сайтов, которых нет в исключениях подписок терпит фиаско. Это не работает, даже если отключить все подписки и оставить лишь собственные фильтры. Линки yandex.ru/ads/* в логе даже не маркируются как заблокированные и реклама вполне успешно пролезает.

Какого блин чёрта ?

</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> вкупе с любым глобальным http$replace - фильтром в "своём" блок-листе

А если так? (часть, которая ищет совпадение адреса сделал регулярным выражением)
`/http/$replace=/a/b/`

comment.body:
I saw it once, but after restarting the protection it's gone.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

Реклама блокируется, но у меня остаток был - его убрал. Обновление станет доступно в фильтрах через 2-3 часа.
У вас скорее всего что-то с сертификатом (на скриншоте это видно), поэтому яндекс не фильтруется. Попробуйте также через 2-3 часа обновить фильтры, очистить данные браузера, перезапустить его, открыть сайт.

issue.title: VG.no - Blocked videos (AdGuard Cookie Notices filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tv.vg.no/ (probably geo restricted)

https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.vg.no/`

### Issue:
Some videos won't load, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted first.

### Examples:
`https://tv.vg.no/` (probably geo restricted)

`https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/`

### Screenshots:
* **With blocked cookie consent:**

![filterissue-vg3](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/6789847f-3b9f-406e-8229-fe4f33e35a7a)

* **After the cookie consent has been accepted:**

![filterissue-vg4](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/cde055a1-3424-4015-94dc-a24059337ba8)

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
```
speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Possible fix:
```
- speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]

+ speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/18245/~~ _**(FIXED)**_
~~`||cmp.vg.no^`~~

* **I don't care about cookies** **_(NOTIFIED)_**
```
/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=vg.no|boerse.de|bt.no|liberation.fr

cmp.$domain=telerama.fr|courrierinternational.com|vodkaster.com|svd.se|histoire-et-civilisations.com|malservice.aftonbladet.se|vg.no|tv.nu|tek.no|finn.no|pent.no|godt.no|aftenposten.no|omni.se|e24.no|helthjem.no|minmote.no|aftenbladet.no|klart.se
```

### Temp fix:
~~`vg.no#@#div[id^="sp_message_container_"]`
`@@||cmp.vg.no^`
`||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important`~~

### Updated temp. fix (for uBO):
Until everything has been resolved, this should cover the current issues for all of the mentioned problem filters, in a more convenient way:
```
vg.no##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .btns-container > button[title="Tilpass"])
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .message-row > button[title="Avvis alle"], , 2000)
@@||cmp.vg.no^
||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important
@@||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^$domain=vg.no
```
(Credit for the above `##+js` rules goes to **piquark6046**)

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v121.0-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Can you share the Troubleshooting Information in uBO support tab?

No need for that.
I troubleshooted this issue quite thoroughly yesterday, disabling all other filters and what not.
@@||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^$domain=vg.no is needed, for certain!

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tv.vg.no/ (probably geo restricted)

https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.vg.no/`

### Issue:
Some videos won't load, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted first.

### Examples:
`https://tv.vg.no/` (probably geo restricted)

`https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/`

### Screenshots:
* **With blocked cookie consent:**

![filterissue-vg3](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/6789847f-3b9f-406e-8229-fe4f33e35a7a)

* **After the cookie consent has been accepted:**

![filterissue-vg4](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/cde055a1-3424-4015-94dc-a24059337ba8)

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
```
speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Possible fix:
```
- speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]

+ speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/18245/~~ _**(FIXED)**_
~~`||cmp.vg.no^`~~

* **I don't care about cookies** **_(NOTIFIED)_**
```
/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=vg.no|boerse.de|bt.no|liberation.fr

cmp.$domain=telerama.fr|courrierinternational.com|vodkaster.com|svd.se|histoire-et-civilisations.com|malservice.aftonbladet.se|vg.no|tv.nu|tek.no|finn.no|pent.no|godt.no|aftenposten.no|omni.se|e24.no|helthjem.no|minmote.no|aftenbladet.no|klart.se
```

### Temp fix:
~~`vg.no#@#div[id^="sp_message_container_"]`
`@@||cmp.vg.no^`
`||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important`~~

### Updated temp. fix (for uBO):
Until everything has been resolved, this should cover the current issues for all of the mentioned problem filters, in a more convenient way:
```
vg.no##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .btns-container > button[title="Tilpass"])
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .message-row > button[title="Avvis alle"], , 2000)
@@||cmp.vg.no^
||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important
@@||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^$domain=vg.no
```
(Credit for the above `##+js` rules goes to **piquark6046**)

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v121.0-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: VG.no - Blocked videos (AdGuard Cookie Notices filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tv.vg.no/ (probably geo restricted)

https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.vg.no/`

### Issue:
Some videos won't load, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted first.

### Examples:
`https://tv.vg.no/` (probably geo restricted)

`https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/`

### Screenshots:
* **With blocked cookie consent:**

![filterissue-vg3](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/6789847f-3b9f-406e-8229-fe4f33e35a7a)

* **After the cookie consent has been accepted:**

![filterissue-vg4](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/cde055a1-3424-4015-94dc-a24059337ba8)

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
```
speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Possible fix:
```
- speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]

+ speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/18245/~~ _**(FIXED)**_
~~`||cmp.vg.no^`~~

* **I don't care about cookies** **_(NOTIFIED)_**
```
/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=vg.no|boerse.de|bt.no|liberation.fr

cmp.$domain=telerama.fr|courrierinternational.com|vodkaster.com|svd.se|histoire-et-civilisations.com|malservice.aftonbladet.se|vg.no|tv.nu|tek.no|finn.no|pent.no|godt.no|aftenposten.no|omni.se|e24.no|helthjem.no|minmote.no|aftenbladet.no|klart.se
```

### Temp fix:
~~`vg.no#@#div[id^="sp_message_container_"]`
`@@||cmp.vg.no^`
`||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important`~~

### Updated temp. fix (for uBO):
Until everything has been resolved, this should cover the current issues for all of the mentioned problem filters, in a more convenient way:
```
vg.no##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .btns-container > button[title="Tilpass"])
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .message-row > button[title="Avvis alle"], , 2000)
@@||cmp.vg.no^
||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important
@@||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^$domain=vg.no
```
(Credit for the above `##+js` rules goes to **piquark6046**)

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v121.0-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Well, not with uBO.
I guess the rule could be added to '**uBlock filters - Cookie Notices**' instead?

issue.title: VG.no - Blocked videos (AdGuard Cookie Notices filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tv.vg.no/ (probably geo restricted)

https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.vg.no/`

### Issue:
Some videos won't load, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted first.

### Examples:
`https://tv.vg.no/` (probably geo restricted)

`https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/`

### Screenshots:
* **With blocked cookie consent:**

![filterissue-vg3](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/6789847f-3b9f-406e-8229-fe4f33e35a7a)

* **After the cookie consent has been accepted:**

![filterissue-vg4](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/cde055a1-3424-4015-94dc-a24059337ba8)

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
```
speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Possible fix:
```
- speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]

+ speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/18245/~~ _**(FIXED)**_
~~`||cmp.vg.no^`~~

* **I don't care about cookies** **_(NOTIFIED)_**
```
/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=vg.no|boerse.de|bt.no|liberation.fr

cmp.$domain=telerama.fr|courrierinternational.com|vodkaster.com|svd.se|histoire-et-civilisations.com|malservice.aftonbladet.se|vg.no|tv.nu|tek.no|finn.no|pent.no|godt.no|aftenposten.no|omni.se|e24.no|helthjem.no|minmote.no|aftenbladet.no|klart.se
```

### Temp fix:
~~`vg.no#@#div[id^="sp_message_container_"]`
`@@||cmp.vg.no^`
`||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important`~~

### Updated temp. fix (for uBO):
Until everything has been resolved, this should cover the current issues for all of the mentioned problem filters, in a more convenient way:
```
vg.no##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .btns-container > button[title="Tilpass"])
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .message-row > button[title="Avvis alle"], , 2000)
@@||cmp.vg.no^
||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important
@@||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^$domain=vg.no
```
(Credit for the above `##+js` rules goes to **piquark6046**)

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v121.0-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tv.vg.no/ (probably geo restricted)

https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.vg.no/`

### Issue:
Some videos won't load, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted first.

### Examples:
`https://tv.vg.no/` (probably geo restricted)

`https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/`

### Screenshots:
* **With blocked cookie consent:**

![filterissue-vg3](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/6789847f-3b9f-406e-8229-fe4f33e35a7a)

* **After the cookie consent has been accepted:**

![filterissue-vg4](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/cde055a1-3424-4015-94dc-a24059337ba8)

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
```
speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Possible fix:
```
- speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]

+ speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/18245/~~ _**(FIXED)**_
~~`||cmp.vg.no^`~~

* **I don't care about cookies** **_(NOTIFIED)_**
```
/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=vg.no|boerse.de|bt.no|liberation.fr

cmp.$domain=telerama.fr|courrierinternational.com|vodkaster.com|svd.se|histoire-et-civilisations.com|malservice.aftonbladet.se|vg.no|tv.nu|tek.no|finn.no|pent.no|godt.no|aftenposten.no|omni.se|e24.no|helthjem.no|minmote.no|aftenbladet.no|klart.se
```

### Temp fix:
~~`vg.no#@#div[id^="sp_message_container_"]`
`@@||cmp.vg.no^`
`||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important`~~

### Updated temp. fix (for uBO):
Until everything has been resolved, this should cover the current issues for all of the mentioned problem filters, in a more convenient way:
```
vg.no##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .btns-container > button[title="Tilpass"])
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .message-row > button[title="Avvis alle"], , 2000)
@@||cmp.vg.no^
||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important
@@||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^$domain=vg.no
```
(Credit for the above `##+js` rules goes to **piquark6046**)

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v121.0-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Yes, along with `@@||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^$domain=vg.no`

issue.title: ad filtering syntax: `removeparam` modifier doesn't help to clean junk query params that are preceded by a hash (`#`)

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
## Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

## Problem description

* Be a URL with a few rather classic junk query params (`at_medium`, `at_campaign`, etc) — **_but preceded by a `#`_**:
```
https://www.france.tv/films/5606040-une-affaire-privee.html#at_medium=5&at_campaign_group=2&at_campaign=integrale&at_offre=1&at_send_date=20240106&at_recipient_id=459386-1664366309-2d5f2440
```
* Be a custom filter rule (which works all right as long as the query params are preceded by a `?` or an `&`):
```
||*$removeparam=/^(at|ul|utm)_/
```

### Expected behavior

With the aforementioned rule being set, the URL should be rendered as
```
https://www.france.tv/films/5606040-une-affaire-privee.html
```

### Actual behavior

The URL remains unchanged. On the other hand, the filter works all right as long as the query params are preceded by a `?` or an `&`.

## Proposed solution

Not sure, but probably the `^` set of separator characters (separator marks) should also include the hash (`#`).

Excerpt from the KB:

> ### [Special characters](https://adguard.com/kb/general/ad-filtering/create-own-filters/#basic-rules-special-characters)
> (...)
> - **`^`** — a separator character mark. Separator character is any character, but a letter, a digit, or one of the following: `_` `-` `.` `%`. In this example separator characters are shown in bold: `http:`**`//`**`example.com`**`/?`**`t=1`**`&`**`t2=t3`. The end of the address is also accepted as separator.


### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body: I think that the reporter minds that a website can send the hash using `location.hash` and XHR/fetch.

issue.title: ad filtering syntax: `removeparam` modifier doesn't help to clean junk query params that are preceded by a hash (`#`)

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
## Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

## Problem description

* Be a URL with a few rather classic junk query params (`at_medium`, `at_campaign`, etc) — **_but preceded by a `#`_**:
```
https://www.france.tv/films/5606040-une-affaire-privee.html#at_medium=5&at_campaign_group=2&at_campaign=integrale&at_offre=1&at_send_date=20240106&at_recipient_id=459386-1664366309-2d5f2440
```
* Be a custom filter rule (which works all right as long as the query params are preceded by a `?` or an `&`):
```
||*$removeparam=/^(at|ul|utm)_/
```

### Expected behavior

With the aforementioned rule being set, the URL should be rendered as
```
https://www.france.tv/films/5606040-une-affaire-privee.html
```

### Actual behavior

The URL remains unchanged. On the other hand, the filter works all right as long as the query params are preceded by a `?` or an `&`.

## Proposed solution

Not sure, but probably the `^` set of separator characters (separator marks) should also include the hash (`#`).

Excerpt from the KB:

> ### [Special characters](https://adguard.com/kb/general/ad-filtering/create-own-filters/#basic-rules-special-characters)
> (...)
> - **`^`** — a separator character mark. Separator character is any character, but a letter, a digit, or one of the following: `_` `-` `.` `%`. In this example separator characters are shown in bold: `http:`**`//`**`example.com`**`/?`**`t=1`**`&`**`t2=t3`. The end of the address is also accepted as separator.


### Additional information

_No response_

Where did you get this link?

issue.title: VG.no - Blocked videos (AdGuard Cookie Notices filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tv.vg.no/ (probably geo restricted)

https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.vg.no/`

### Issue:
Some videos won't load, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted first.

### Examples:
`https://tv.vg.no/` (probably geo restricted)

`https://vg.no/i/762Qv8/`

### Screenshots:
* **With blocked cookie consent:**

![filterissue-vg3](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/6789847f-3b9f-406e-8229-fe4f33e35a7a)

* **After the cookie consent has been accepted:**

![filterissue-vg4](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/assets/9382674/cde055a1-3424-4015-94dc-a24059337ba8)

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
```
speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Possible fix:
```
- speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,vg.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]

+ speisekarte.de,businessinsider.com,historyextra.com,finn.no,aftenposten.no,tek.no,vglive.no,bt.no,telegraph.co.uk##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
```

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/18245/~~ _**(FIXED)**_
~~`||cmp.vg.no^`~~

* **I don't care about cookies** **_(NOTIFIED)_**
```
/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=vg.no|boerse.de|bt.no|liberation.fr

cmp.$domain=telerama.fr|courrierinternational.com|vodkaster.com|svd.se|histoire-et-civilisations.com|malservice.aftonbladet.se|vg.no|tv.nu|tek.no|finn.no|pent.no|godt.no|aftenposten.no|omni.se|e24.no|helthjem.no|minmote.no|aftenbladet.no|klart.se
```

### Temp fix:
~~`vg.no#@#div[id^="sp_message_container_"]`
`@@||cmp.vg.no^`
`||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important`~~

### Updated temp. fix (for uBO):
Until everything has been resolved, this should cover the current issues for all of the mentioned problem filters, in a more convenient way:
```
vg.no##div[id^="sp_message_container_"]
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .btns-container > button[title="Tilpass"])
cmp.vg.no##+js(trusted-click-element, .message-row > button[title="Avvis alle"], , 2000)
@@||cmp.vg.no^
||cmp.vg.no^*/metrics/$important
@@||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^$domain=vg.no
```
(Credit for the above `##+js` rules goes to **piquark6046**)

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v121.0-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.55.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
